00008 extern u32int _process;
00009 extern Tty *ttys[32];
00010 extern LocalTty *activeTty;
00011 
00012 extern void set_active_tty(int);
00013 
00014 #define CAPSLOCK  0x3a
00015 #define LSHIFT    0x2a
00016 #define RSHIFT    0x36
00017 #define CTRL      0x1d
00018 #define F1        0x3b
00019 #define F2        0x3c
00020 #define F3        0x3d
00021 #define F4        0x3e
00022 
00023 char keymap[256];
00024 char keymap_upper[256];
00025 bool capslock = false;
00026 bool shift = false;
00027 bool ctrl = false;
00028 
00029 void key_handler(int sig)
00030 {
00031   while (inb(0x64) & 0x01) // While there is data available.
00032   {
00033     u8int scancode = inb(0x60);
00034    
00035    if (scancode == 0xe0)
00036    {
00037      return;
00038    }
00039    
00040    // Was this a keypress?
00041    bool keypress = true;
00042    if (scancode & 0x80)
00043    {
00044      keypress = false;
00045      scancode &= 0x7f;
00046    }
00047    
00048    bool useUpper = false;
00049    bool useNums = false;
00050    // Certain scancodes have special meanings.
00051    switch (scancode)
00052    {
00053    case CAPSLOCK:
00054      if (keypress)
00055      {
00056        capslock = !capslock;
00057      }
00058      return;
00059    case LSHIFT:
00060    case RSHIFT:
00061      if (keypress)
00062      {
00063        shift = true;
00064      }
00065      else
00066      {
00067        shift = false;
00068      }
00069      return;
00070    case CTRL:
00071      if (keypress)
00072      {
00073        ctrl = true;
00074      }
00075      else
00076      {
00077        ctrl = false;
00078      }
00079      return;
00080    case F1:
00081      if (keypress)
00082      {
00083        set_active_tty(0);
00084      }
00085      return;
00086    case F2:
00087      if (keypress)
00088      {
00089        set_active_tty(1);
00090      }
00091      return;
00092    case F3:
00093      if (keypress)
00094      {
00095        set_active_tty(2);
00096      }
00097      return;
00098    case F4:
00099      if (keypress)
00100      {
00101        set_active_tty(3);
00102      }
00103      return;
00104    }
00105    
00106    if ( (capslock&&!shift) || (!capslock&&shift) )
00107    {
00108      useUpper = true;
00109    }
00110    if (shift)
00111    {
00112      useNums = true;
00113    }
00114    
00115    if (!keypress)
00116    {
00117      return;
00118    }
00119    
00120    // TODO: implement a proper lockable buffer.
00121    char theChar;
00122    if (scancode < 0x02)
00123    {
00124      theChar = keymap[scancode];
00125    }
00126    else if (scancode < 0x0e /* backspace */ ||
00127             (scancode >= 0x1a /*[*/ && scancode <= 0x1b /*]*/) ||
00128             (scancode >= 0x27 /*;*/ && scancode <= 0x29 /*`*/) ||
00129             (scancode == 0x2b) ||
00130             (scancode >= 0x33 /*,*/ && scancode <= 0x35 /*/*/) )
00131    {
00132      if (useNums)
00133      {
00134        theChar = keymap_upper[scancode];
00135      }
00136      else
00137      {
00138        theChar = keymap[scancode];
00139      }
00140    }
00141    else if ( (scancode >= 0x10 /*Q*/ && scancode <= 0x19 /*P*/) ||
00142              (scancode >= 0x1e /*A*/ && scancode <= 0x26 /*L*/) ||
00143              (scancode >= 0x2c /*Z*/ && scancode <= 0x32 /*M*/) )
00144    {
00145      if (useUpper)
00146      {
00147        theChar = keymap_upper[scancode];
00148      }
00149      else
00150      {
00151        theChar = keymap[scancode];
00152      }
00153    }
00154    else if (scancode <= 0x39 /* space */)
00155    {
00156      theChar = keymap[scancode];
00157    }
00158    else
00159    {
00160      return;
00161    }
00162    activeTty->inputReceived(theChar);
00163    termios_t t;
00164    activeTty->tcgetattr(&t);
00165    if (t.c_lflag & ECHO)
00166    {
00167      if ( (t.c_lflag & ECHONL) && 
00168           (theChar == '\n') )
00169      {
00170        activeTty->write(theChar);
00171      }
00172      else if ( (t.c_lflag & ECHOE) &&
00173                (theChar == (char)0x08) )
00174      {
00175        activeTty->backspace();
00176      }
00177      else if (theChar != '\n' && theChar != (char)0x08)
00178      {
00179        activeTty->write(theChar);
00180      }
00181    }
00182   }
00183 }
00184 
00185 void keyboard_init()
00186 {
00187   signal(18, &key_handler);
00188   u32int irqDispatcher = requestResource((char*)"IRQDispatcher");
00189   callResource(irqDispatcher, IRQDispatcher_IF::registerHandler, 1, getpid(), 18);
00190   
00191   while (inb(0x64) & 0x01) // While there is data available.
00192   {
00193     u8int scancode = inb(0x60);
00194   }
00195   
00196   keymap[0x00] = 0x00;
00197   keymap[0x01] = 0x1b; // Escape
00198   keymap[0x02] = '1';
00199   keymap[0x03] = '2';
00200   keymap[0x04] = '3';
00201   keymap[0x05] = '4';
00202   keymap[0x06] = '5';
00203   keymap[0x07] = '6';
00204   keymap[0x08] = '7';
00205   keymap[0x09] = '8';
00206   keymap[0x0a] = '9';
00207   keymap[0x0b] = '0';
00208   keymap[0x0c] = '-';
00209   keymap[0x0d] = '=';
00210   keymap[0x0e] = 0x08; // Backspace
00211   keymap[0x0f] = 0x09; // Tab
00212   keymap[0x10] = 'q';
00213   keymap[0x11] = 'w';
00214   keymap[0x12] = 'e';
00215   keymap[0x13] = 'r';
00216   keymap[0x14] = 't';
00217   keymap[0x15] = 'y';
00218   keymap[0x16] = 'u';
00219   keymap[0x17] = 'i';
00220   keymap[0x18] = 'o';
00221   keymap[0x19] = 'p';
00222   keymap[0x1a] = '[';
00223   keymap[0x1b] = ']';
00224   keymap[0x1c] = '\n'; // Enter
00225   keymap[0x1d] = 0x00; // LCtrl
00226   keymap[0x1e] = 'a';
00227   keymap[0x1f] = 's';
00228   keymap[0x20] = 'd';
00229   keymap[0x21] = 'f';
00230   keymap[0x22] = 'g';
00231   keymap[0x23] = 'h';
00232   keymap[0x24] = 'j';
00233   keymap[0x25] = 'k';
00234   keymap[0x26] = 'l';
00235   keymap[0x27] = ';';
00236   keymap[0x28] = '\'';
00237   keymap[0x29] = '`';
00238   keymap[0x2a] = 0x00; // LShift
00239   keymap[0x2b] = '\\';
00240   keymap[0x2c] = 'z';
00241   keymap[0x2d] = 'x';
00242   keymap[0x2e] = 'c';
00243   keymap[0x2f] = 'v';
00244   keymap[0x30] = 'b';
00245   keymap[0x31] = 'n';
00246   keymap[0x32] = 'm';
00247   keymap[0x33] = ',';
00248   keymap[0x34] = '.';
00249   keymap[0x35] = '/';
00250   keymap[0x36] = 0x00; // RShift
00251   keymap[0x37] = '*';  // Keypad-*
00252   keymap[0x38] = 0x00; // LAlt
00253   keymap[0x39] = ' ';
00254   
00255   keymap_upper[0x02] = '!';
00256   keymap_upper[0x03] = '@';
00257   keymap_upper[0x04] = 0x00;
00258   keymap_upper[0x05] = '$';
00259   keymap_upper[0x06] = '%';
00260   keymap_upper[0x07] = '^';
00261   keymap_upper[0x08] = '&';
00262   keymap_upper[0x09] = '*';

00264   keymap_upper[0x0b] = ')';
